definitions.definition: accident; mishap (Classifier: 個／个 m; 起 m)

parsedExamples.example: 緊急事故 / 紧急事故  ―  jǐnjí shìgù  ―  emergency
事故高發路段 / 事故高发路段  ―  shìgù gāofā lùduàn  ―  stretch of road prone to traffic accidents
出事故了。  ―  Chū shìgù le.  ―  There's been an accident.

parsedExamples.translation: Tā yùdào le yī ge shìgù. [Pinyin]
Tā zài nà cì shìgù zhōng ānránwúyàng. [Pinyin]
Shìgù de chùlǐ yào yángé ànzhào guójiā fǎlǜ guīdìng de tiáolì lái zhíxíng. [Pinyin]

examples: 緊急事故 / 紧急事故  ―  jǐnjí shìgù  ―  emergency
事故高發路段 / 事故高发路段  ―  shìgù gāofā lùduàn  ―  stretch of road prone to traffic accidents
出事故了。  ―  Chū shìgù le.  ―  There's been an accident.
